articles.title: BBC Sport's top 40 most engaging football stories this season
articles.description: These are the most engaging football stories that you have been reading this season. Grab a brew, sit down and enjoy.
articles.content:
What follows below are the football stories that BBC Sport's users found the most engaging this season across our website and app.

articles.title: Grealish carried out of hotel, Mbappe drops PSG bombshell, Rice to Arsenal latest
articles.description: talkSPORT.com brings you all the latest football news, views and transfer gossip from the Premier League and beyond. Top stories: Jack Grealish goes topless on tram and Erling Haaland pours champag…
articles.content: Kylian Mbappe has told Paris St Germain he will not take up a one-year contract extension, according to reports, so could be sold this summer or will be able to leave as a free agent at the end of ne… [+890 chars]

articles.title: Deion Sanders in Joel Klatt interview series: 'I got to get it now'
articles.description: In college football’s new and ever-evolving landscape, Coach Prime is providing a master class in how to efficiently turn over a roster. And, he told Joel Klatt, he's offering no apologies.
articles.content: Editors Note: This summer, FOX Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt is interviewing the biggest names in college football as part of his new podcast series, "The Joel Klatt Show: Big Noon Conve… [+7100 chars]

articles.title: Five famous people (and one cat) you didn't know have ESPNcricinfo profiles | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Why do a footballer, a Nobel laureate and a prime minister (no, not Imran Khan) find themselves in the ESPNcricinfo player database? | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content:
